TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit StreamUpgradeBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement

Docs.summary: Adds a custom stream upgrade provider to a custom binding.

remarks.format:
## Remarks To indicate that a custom stream upgrade provider should be used, implement a binding element that implements this `abstract` class on the custom binding.
This `abstract` class is implemented by:
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WindowsStreamSecurityBindingElement>
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SslStreamSecurityBindingElement>

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeBindingElement elementToBeCloned) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance of this class to be cloned.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from an existing instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider BuildClientStreamUpgradeProvider(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext> for the entire channel stack.
Docs.summary: Creates an instance on the client of the based on the channel context provided.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is called when opening the client channel factory and provides a custom implementation of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>`abstract` class.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext> parameter enables reacting to other elements in the channel stack.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider BuildServerStreamUpgradeProvider(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext> for the entire channel stack.
Docs.summary: Creates an instance on the server of the based on the channel context provided.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is called when opening the service and provides a custom implementation of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>`abstract` class.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext> parameter enables reacting to other elements in the channel stack.
